titles.title: Heightened Oversight of Travel, Eating, and Lodging Act of 2018
To prohibit Federal agencies from using Government funds to pay for the lodging of agency employees at establishments that are owned by or employ certain public officials or their relatives.
Heightened Oversight of Travel, Eating, and Lodging Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Heightened Oversight of Travel, Eating, and Lodging Act of 2018
This bill prohibits a federal agency from reimbursing an employee's lodging costs at an establishment that is owned by, or that employs, certain public officials or their relatives.
